appDesc: Developed a complete e-commerce solution consisting of a customer-facing mobile app and an admin desktop panel using Flutter. The mobile app enables users to browse products, add them to cart, and place orders with secure Firebase Authentication and real-time Supabase integration for data handling. The admin desktop app allows administrators to manage users, products, and orders with role-based access control and a clean, responsive dashboard interface, ensuring smooth management and a seamless shopping experience.

Developed a dynamic news application using Flutter that fetches and displays real-time news articles from a REST API. Implemented intuitive category-based filtering, allowing users to easily browse news relevant to their interests. Designed a fully responsive user interface that adapts seamlessly across various screen sizes, including phones, tablets, and web/desktop layouts.

An advanced AI voice assistant built with Flutter, powered by ChatGPT 4.1. Features natural conversation through Speech-to-Text/Text-to-Speech, remembers past interactions for continuous dialogue (data persistence), supports Dark Mode, and uses MVVM architecture for clean code. Includes custom animations for an engaging UI.

A smart, voice-powered note-taking app built with Flutter. It streamlines note-taking by offering both typing and instant Speech-to-Text transcription. Features include fast, offline storage via Hive Database, Text-to-Speech playback, Dark Mode, and real-time search. Utilizes Provider for efficient state management.
